The unique design of the glitter fabric with transparent fan rib is sure to make you stand out from the crowd. Whether you're attending a wedding, church, festival, dance, party, prom, or club, this fan is the perfect accessory to complete your look. 

Opening the fan is a breeze, and it even glows in the dark or under light, making it a great addition to your EDM accessories. The lightweight yet sturdy construction allows you to carry this fan anywhere you go. 

Not only is this fan perfect for special occasions, but it is also suitable for everyday use. Take it with you to the beach, seaside, or on your nights out. It can even be used as a wall decoration.
